title: NA speaker pays tribute to Sawar Muhammad Hussain Shaheed on 53rd martyrdom anniversary
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 10 (APP):National Assembly Speaker Sardar Ayaz Sadiq on Tuesday paid tribute to Sawar Muhammad Hussain Shaheed (Nishan-e-Haider) on his 53rd martyrdom anniversary.
Sardar Ayaz Sadiq highlighted the supreme sacrifice made by Sawar Muhammad Hussain Shaheed in the defense of the country, recalling his unmatched courage and valor during the 1971 war.
“The whole nation honors his unparalleled sacrifice and patriotic spirit,” Sardar Ayaz Sadiq stated. “Sawar Muhammad Hussain Shaheed fought for the honor and security of the nation, and his contributions will forever be remembered.”
The speaker also prayed for the elevation of Sawar Muhammad Hussain Shaheed’s ranks in the Jannah, and for the continued security and progress of the country, emphasizing the importance of honoring the sacrifices of Pakistan’s martyrs.
The nation, as a whole, remains united in remembering and saluting the bravery and sacrifices of its fallen heroes.
